Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to prohibiting the use of funds, financial incentives or subsidies where facilities or property are used primarily for e-commerce storage and transfers, or the facilitation thereof
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the use of funds, financial incentives or subsidies where facilities or property are used primarily for e-commerce storage and transfers, or the facilitation thereof.
LawCode: Amd §862, Gen Muni L; amd §§1953 & 2306, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting the use of funds, financial incentives or subsidies where facilities or property are used primarily for e-commerce storage and transfers, or the facilitation thereof
